title: Create Milestone

params.name: name
params.desc: Required. The name of the Milestone.

params.name: categories
params.desc: An array of IDs of Categories attached to the Milestone.

params.name: completed_at_override
params.desc: A manual override for the time/date the Milestone was completed.

params.name: started_at_override
params.desc: A manual override for the time/date the Milestone was started.

params.name: state
params.desc: The workflow state that the Milestone is in.

description: Create Milestone allows you to create a new Milestone in Clubhouse.
